message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $140 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $155.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $145 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm still willing to work with you. I'm now offering the product to you for $152.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $147.50 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm still willing to work with you. I'm now offering the product to you for $151.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $149 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm still willing to work with you. I'm now offering the product to you for $150.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiation. I would like to counter with an offer of $148 for the product.
